author: pietjepuk
content: Not sure I agree with the "more people [in a certain channel] = wider adoption of Ethereum", it's certainly a very large logic step. Imo there's plenty of room for discussion/feedback in this server, see e.g. all the new protocol fellowship folks or the discussions around blob sharding. And having a channel called allcoredevs open to only, eh, all core devs makes sense to me ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

author: alexssd7fp
content: While I do agree with this, I still think that being able to leave a message to "all core devs" as a non-core dev is a great thing to have. And to prevent spam I'd add a disclaimer stating that "if you can, it doesn't mean that you should"
